contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Mayor | image = | honorific-prefix = Mayor | name = Adhémar Raynault | honorific-suffix = | caption = | order = 36th [[Mayor of Montreal]] | term_start = 1936 | term_end = 1938 | constituency = | predecessor = [[Camillien Houde]] | successor = [[Camillien Houde]] (returned) | term_start2 = 1940 | term_end2 = 1944 | constituency2 = | predecessor2 = [[Camillien Houde]] | successor2 = [[Camillien Houde]] (returned) | birth_date = 12 July 1891 | birth_place = [[Saint-Gérard-de-Magella, Quebec]], [[Canada]] | death_date = {{Death date and age|1984|4|11|1891|7|12}} | death_place = [[Saint-Bruno, Quebec]], [[Canada]] | party = | alma_mater = | spouse = | profession = [[Businessperson|businessman]] | religion = | signature = }} '''Adhémar Raynault''' (12 July 1891 - 11 April 1984) was a [[Canadian]] politician and a [[Mayor of Montreal]]. ==City Politics== He was a City Councillor for the district of Préfontaine from 1934 to 1936. He also served as Mayor from 1936 to 1938, and from 1940 to 1944. His last tenure as mayor was provisionally served while [[Camillien Houde]] was interned for wartime opposition to [[conscription]]. ==Member of the Provincial Legislature== Raynault was elected to the [[Legislative Assembly of Quebec]] in the [[L'Assomption (provincial electoral district)|L'Assomption]] in the [[Quebec general election, 1936|1936]] and sat with the [[Union Nationale (Quebec)|Union Nationale]], but he did not run again in the [[Quebec general election, 1939|1939 election]]. ==External links== {{Portal|Biography}} * {{QuebecMNAbio|raynault-adhemar-5051}} {{S-start}} {{S-off}} {{Succession box| before=[[Georges Lalancette]]| years=1934-1936| after=[[Armand Taillon]]| title=[[City Council]]lor of Préfontaine }} {{S-par|ca-qc}} {{Succession box| before=[[Paul Gouin|Paul Gouin (ALN)]]| years=[[Quebec general election, 1936|1936]]-[[Quebec general election, 1939|1939]]| after=[[Bernard Bissonnette|Bernard Bissonnette (Liberal)]]| title=[[Legislative Assembly of Quebec|MLA]], District of [[L'Assomption (provincial electoral district)|L'Assomption]] }} {{S-end}} {{Mayors of Montreal}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]] --> | NAME =Raynault, Adhémar | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Canadian politician | DATE OF BIRTH =12 July 1891 | PLACE OF BIRTH =[[Saint-Gérard-de-Magella, Quebec]], [[Canada]] | DATE OF DEATH =11 April 1984 | PLACE OF DEATH =[[Saint-Bruno, Quebec]], [[Canada]] }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Raynault, Adhemar}} [[Category:1891 births]] [[Category:1984 deaths]] [[Category:Mayors of Montreal]] [[Category:Montreal city councillors]] [[Category:Union Nationale (Quebec) MNAs]]
